name: Step
description: Each step should be wrapped with a `Wizard.Step` component directly inside Wizard.Container.

props.name: title
props.doc: An unique title of the step.

props.name: inactive
props.doc: Will treat the step as non-navigable if set to `true`.

props.name: required
props.doc: Will make all nested form fields required.

props.name: include
props.doc: If set to `false`, the step will not be rendered.

props.name: includeWhen
props.doc: Provide a `path` and a `hasValue` property with the expected value in order to enable the step. You can alternatively provide a `hasValue` function that returns a boolean. The first parameter is the value of the path.

props.name: keepInDOM
props.doc: Determines if the step should be kept in the DOM. Defaults to `false`.

props.name: active
props.doc: Deprecated, use `include`. Old docs: If set to `false`, the step will not be rendered.

props.name: activeWhen
props.doc: Deprecated, use `includeWhen`. Old docs: Provide a `path` and a `hasValue` property with the expected value in order to enable the step. You can alternatively provide a `hasValue` function that returns a boolean. The first parameter is the value of the path.
